scripts.build: cat src/bundle-header.js > examples/js/bundle.js && browserify -r patroljs -r threejs-geometry-hittest -r three -r hyper3d | uglifyjs --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 >> examples/js/bundle.js
scripts.build-debug: browserify -r patroljs -r threejs-geometry-hittest -r three -r hyper3d -d -o bundle-raw.js && cat src/bundle-header.js bundle-raw.js > examples/js/bundle.js
